name: OR_CASE_STAFF_NEED
description: The OR_CASE_STAFF_NEED table contains OR management system case surgical staff.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the surgical staff requested for the case.

columns.name: STAFF_REQ_YN
columns.description: The category value which indicates whether the surgical staff member is required for the case.

columns.name: STAFF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specific surgical staff member requested for the case.

columns.name: STAFF_START_OFFSET
columns.description: The start time for the surgical staff. It is measured in minutes relative to the beginning of the case.

columns.name: STAFF_END_OFFSET
columns.description: The end time for the surgical staff. It is measured in minutes relative to the beginning of the case.

columns.name: STAFF_PANEL
columns.description: The panel where the surgical staff is requested.

columns.name: STAFF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of surgical staff requested for the case.
